_instructions: Hero section content - the first thing visitors see on your portfolio.
name: SATHVIKA KALAPALA
title: Data Analyst
summary:
Data Analyst with 3+ years across the U.S. and India (healthcare and consumer electronics). Expert in turning raw, messy
data into automated pipelines and decision-ready dashboards. Strong in SQL, Python (Pandas/NumPy), Tableau/Power BI,
and cloud data stacks (Snowflake, AWS, Databricks). Delivers measurable impact-lower denial rates, faster refresh SLAs,
improved forecast accuracy-while partnering closely with business and clinical stakeholders.
